text: Maryam baxi masiic (Nabii Qiisa kinnuk) kalah kah yanim mali, Nummah kaak duma warrayte farmoytiitik farmoytak teynah yan kaa akke waytek, kay ina kaa kee kaal oobe kitab Nummasseeh maggom Nummat yabta Barra kinni, ken Nammay Seehadak fuxxih (muxxih) maaqo yakmeeh maaqoh ceyta marah sugen, Nabii Mucammadow wagitaay cubbus Ni-inkittinaanee kee Ni-dudda tascassee Astooti Baxxaqqa keenih elle hayna inna, tohuk lakal usun cakkik elle daggaawan inna wagitey
